meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mountainous.
meanings.sent1: The mountainousnesses of the region made hiking challenging.
meanings.sent2: The mountainousnesses of the landscape provided breathtaking views.
meanings.sent3: The mountainousnesses of the area made it perfect for mountain climbers.
meanings.sent4: Her determination had a mountainousnesses that could not be conquered.
meanings.sent5: The mountainousnesses of the terrain loomed large in their minds.

meanings.definition: The extent or amount of mountainous terrain.
meanings.sent1: The vast mountainousnesses of the country attracted adventurers.
meanings.sent2: The mountainousnesses of the region were a challenge for road construction.
meanings.sent3: The mountainousnesses of the map made it difficult to navigate.
meanings.sent4: The mountainousnesses of the landscape seemed endless.
meanings.sent5: The mountainousnesses of the area were awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having many mountains.
meanings.sent1: The mountainousnesses of the continent drew mountain climbers from around the world.
meanings.sent2: The mountainousnesses of the region were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The mountainousnesses of the country were a challenge for urban development.
meanings.sent4: The mountainousnesses of the area created a natural barrier.
meanings.sent5: The mountainousnesses of the landscape were majestic.
